subSubSection.paragraph: D i s t r i b u t i o n Seychelles : Inner Seychelles ( Mahé , Silhouette) – Madagascar : Prov. Antananarivo : Ampefy (Lac Kavitaha), Antananarivo , Antsirabe – Prov. Toamasina : Analalandraka (near Andekaleka (Rogez), Andranofotsy, Anosibe – Prov. Fianarantsoa : Mananjary – Prov. Toliara : Behara, Bekily, Fort Dauphin (? leg. Elliot).
